Posts.Content: ChelseaSculler wrote: I'm not starting radiation for at least a few more weeks, so while I've read all about what to expect and what may help during the process, any tips for preparing in advance? My RO said no, but I find it hard to believe there's nothing, whether that's increasing fluid intake, moisturizing the scar tissue, or keeping up exercise. Thoughts?
